message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $12,000. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand your enthusiasm for the product, but given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider offers within $8,000. I would like to propose a price of $9,500. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still confident that this product will bring significant value to you. I'm willing to meet you halfway between my original offer and your counteroffer. I propose a new price of $10,500. What do you think?

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the effort, I still need to stay within my budget. I would like to counter with an offer of $10,000. I hope this helps us reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

I understand your desire to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm still not willing to compromise too much on the price. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. I propose a new price of $10,250. This is as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, Alice. Considering the value I believe the product will bring me, I would like to counter with an offer of $10,000. I hope this proposal is acceptable.

I understand that you're firm on the price, Bob, but I'm not willing to give up yet. I'm willing to make a final adjustment, but I need to make sure it's worth my while. I propose a new price of $10,100. This is my final offer. What do you think?

Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I respect your position and am willing to meet you halfway. I would like to counter with an offer of $10,050. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're considering.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob, but I'm still not willing to compromise too much on the price. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. I propose a new price of $10,075. This is my final offer. What do you think?

I appreciate your persistence, Alice. Considering the value I believe the product will provide, I would like to counter with an offer of $10,062.50. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're considering.
